pageProduct.name: Optive Gel Drops 10ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

OPTIVE? helps relieve Dry Eye Symptoms such as:

Burning
Dry & Gritty
Watery
Stinging
What is Dry Eye?

Dry Eye is a condition that occurs when your eyes either produce too few tears or the quality of your tears are poor. This can cause dryness, discomfort and may interfere with vision.

Symptoms of Dry Eye include: burning or stinging, gritty or foreign body sensation, and watery or blurry.

How to use OPTIVE? Eye Drops

Step 1

Wash hands with soap and water; dry them with a clean towel. Tilt your head back with both eyes open and look at a point on the ceiling.

With your index finger, gently pull your lower eyelid to form a small pocket inside the eyelid.

Step 2

With the other hand, gently squeeze 1 drop into the pocket.

Do not allow the tip to come into contact with your eye.

Step 3

Slowly close both eyes, but do not blink or squeeze your eyes, and gently press the inner corners of your eyes (by your nose) with your fingers for about 2 minutes.

This will help the eye drops remain in your eye for a longer period.

Step 4

Gently blot extra drops from face with a damp cloth. Repeat steps 1-4 for the other eye.

Replace the cap immediately after use.

OPTIVE? Gel Drops

- Protects at night

- Extra strength formula to relieve dry, stinging and burning eyes

- Suitable for moderate to severe dry eye sufferers

- Lubricates and hydrates persistent dry eyes

- Provides long lasting relief night or day

- Contact lens compatible

Drag to spin Drag to spin Drag to spin Drag to spin Drag to spin Drag to spin

General Information

Optive Gel Drops - Extra strength day and night dry eye relief

OPTIVE® Gel Drops are specially formulated to lubricate and hydrate persistent dry eyes. Provides long lasting relief for night or day.

- Extra strength formula to relieve dry, stinging and burning eyes.

- Compatible with contact lenses.

- Can be used night or day.

- Instant and long lasting relief and protection.

Indications: For instant and long lasting relief of persistent dry eye symptoms night or day. Compatible with contact lenses.

Extra strength day & night dry eye relief.

Can be used up to 3 months from opening.

STERILE A.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

For external use only.
Keep out of reach of children.
To avoid contamination, do not touch tip of container to any surface. Replace cap after use. Discontinue use and consult a doctor if you experience eye pain, changes in vision, continued redness or irritation of the eye, or if the condition worsens or persists for more than 72 hours.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Do not use if solution changes colour. Contents are sterile if imprinted seal is intact.

Ingredients

Each mL contains: 10 mg Carmellose Sodium, 9 mg Glycerin, 0.1mg PURITE® (preservative).

Directions

Can be used up to 3 months from opening.

USAGE ADVICE

Instil 1 or 2 drops in each affected eye(s). Can be used as often as needed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
